A Strange Mate

Difficulty: Checkmate level

White has an interesting mate in 2 moves.

In the puzzle below, it is White to move. Find a way to checkmate Black.

Note that Black has no good moves.
It's a rook move
Rook to h1, then any of Black's moves can be answered with a mate. I think there are probably other stall moves that work too, such as king to h1.
chess checkmate

I like puzzles and riddles, and I'm collecting some of the ones I like here.
